game.name: Parkour Bot
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Parkour Bot is a fast paced, rhythm based, physics platform game, with an unique movement set of main character. Show your skills and get a lot of achievements in 100 dynamic levels.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Parkour Bot is a fast paced, rhythm based, physics platform game, with an unique movement set of main character. Show your skills and get a lot of achievements in 100 dynamic levels.
